com.siemens.sbom.standardbom.model

Class ExternalComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.siemens.sbom.standardbom.model.ExternalComponent

  • public class ExternalComponent
extends Object
    A component which is referenced by this SBOM, but which is not itself part of it. For example, we might reference a component in a backend system. In terms of CycloneDX, this is not a Component, but an ExternalReference.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Pattern BLACKDUCK_COMPONENT_ID_PATTERN
      In BlackDuck CodeCenter, IDs are decimal numbers of up to 12 digits.
      static Pattern SW360_ID_PATTERN
      In SW360, IDs are 32-digit hexadecimal values.
      static String UNKNOWN_PURL
      A PackageURL that SCP understands as "I don't know the purl".

    • Field Detail

      • BLACKDUCK_COMPONENT_ID_PATTERN

        public static final Pattern BLACKDUCK_COMPONENT_ID_PATTERN
        In BlackDuck CodeCenter, IDs are decimal numbers of up to 12 digits.

      • SW360_ID_PATTERN

        public static final Pattern SW360_ID_PATTERN
        In SW360, IDs are 32-digit hexadecimal values.

      • UNKNOWN_PURL

        public static final String UNKNOWN_PURL
        A PackageURL that SCP understands as "I don't know the purl". Still a valid purl which prevents the CycloneDX serializer from skipping this object. We use this as a default value for the url field, until the PackageURL specification introduces an official value for this case.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • setExternalId

        public void setExternalId(@Nullable
                          String pExternalId)
        Set the external ID which identifies this component in the external system. Validation is not performed.
        Parameters:
        pExternalId - the external ID
        See Also:
        setExternalId(String, Pattern)

      • setExternalId

        public void setExternalId(@Nullable
                          String pExternalId,
                          @Nullable
                          Pattern pValidationPattern)
        Set the external ID which identifies this component in the external system.
        Parameters:
        pExternalId - the external ID
        pValidationPattern - optional validation pattern for the ID, for example SW360_ID_PATTERN or BLACKDUCK_COMPONENT_ID_PATTERN
